1652660.name: Capoeira Origins
1652660.description:
Capoeira Origins is an action-adventure experience set in colonial Brazil during the period of slavery. Experience history from the perspective of those who resisted, taking on the role of capoeiristas determined to fight for freedom, justice, and survival.

Explore farms, quilombos, and colonial ports as you free enslaved people, face overseers, merchants, and soldiers, and master the moves of capoeira—a martial art that blends dance, music, and fighting. With a compelling narrative, percussive soundtrack, and stylized visuals, the game offers a powerful journey based on historical facts and Afro-Brazilian heritage.

  • 5 playable characters

  • 16 levels set in colonial Brazil

  • Dozens of real capoeira moves
1652660.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
